Posts.EditableText:
Hi everybody, I was just wondering if anyone would take the time to hunt down the authors of these games and ask them if they could add their games to the site so everyone can enjoy them. Thank you!

Here are the games:
16 ways to kill a vampire at mcdonalds
Fair
Pogomen Go

All three were among...i believe the top ten out of around 50 in the IF Comp competition. 
Also, feel free to request your own games! Hopefully someone will notice the thread.
